Topic.Title: Quest keeps crashing what does this error mean?

Posts.EditableText: It says you are missing code, I think.
Posts.HTML: It says you are missing code, I think.

Posts.EditableText: The list of recently played games is corrupted. This seems to happen sometimes. I think the normal recommendation is to reinstall Quest, as the installer will setup the registry correctly.
Posts.HTML: The list of recently played games is corrupted. This seems to happen sometimes. I think the normal recommendation is to reinstall Quest, as the installer will setup the registry correctly.

Posts.EditableText: ok it works now thank you
